&#3923;&#3964;&#3938;: [1531] ... 1) rgyu dngos sam rgyu rdzas dang/ dkor/ ... spyi nor la gces spras byed dgos/ ... rgyun du 'gro gron mkhas gtong ma byas pas nor god pa/ ... thon skyed la brten na gzhi nas spyi tshogs kyi nor spel thub pa/ ... 2) 'bri g.yag ba lang dang mdzo mdzo mo sogs gnag phyugs rigs/ ... yangs pa'i spang thang nor gyis khengs/ ... 3) (mngon) nor lha dang mtshungs pas grangs brgyad mtshon/ ...
property, possessions, *, riches, money, cattle, mistakes
1) *, possessions, property, riches, goods, richness; 2) jewel; 3) cattle, yaks; 4) 8 [nor lha]; 5) err, make a mistake, be wrong/ mistaken; 6) mistake, error, fault
*; 1) {nor ba} vi. to err, be wrong, be mistaken, make a mistake. 2) mistake, error, fault, 3) *, possessions, jewel, property, riches, goods, richness. Syn {nor bu} 4) cattle, yaks
&#3942;&#4019;&#3964;&#3908;&#3942;: slong ba!. (tha dad pa bslang pa, bslang ba, slongs,; 1) arise! make rise/ stand up! raise! erect! put up!*; 2) don du gnyer ba dang, ask/ solicit/ beg for! request!; 3) incite! provoke! make start!
